Access Control.question: Do you implement role-based access control (RBAC) for all system users?
Describe your user account provisioning and de-provisioning procedures.
Do you enforce multi-factor authentication for all privileged accounts?
How frequently do you review and update user access permissions?
Do you maintain segregation of duties for critical business functions?
What password policies and complexity requirements do you enforce?
Do you implement least privilege access principles across all systems?
How do you monitor and log privileged user activities?
Do you have automated account lockout mechanisms for failed login attempts?
What procedures do you have for emergency access to critical systems?
Do you conduct regular access certification and recertification processes?

Describe your asset classification scheme and data labeling procedures.
How do you track asset ownership and custodianship responsibilities?
Do you implement automated asset discovery and inventory management tools?
What procedures do you have for secure asset disposal and data sanitization?
Do you maintain asset configuration baselines and change tracking?
How do you handle asset lifecycle management from procurement to disposal?
Do you have established procedures for handling lost or stolen assets?
What software license management processes do you maintain?
Do you conduct regular physical asset audits and reconciliation?
How do you manage and track mobile devices and remote access equipment?
Do you implement asset tagging and tracking for all company-owned equipment?
What controls do you have for personal device usage in corporate environments?
Do you maintain records of asset maintenance, updates, and patches?
How do you ensure proper asset accountability during employee transitions?
Do you have procedures for handling third-party assets in your environment?
What asset recovery and business continuity procedures do you maintain?

What are your defined Recovery Time Objectives (RTO) and Recovery Point Objectives (RPO)?
Do you maintain alternate site facilities for critical business operations?
How do you ensure staff availability and communication during business disruptions?
Do you conduct annual business continuity exercises and document lessons learned?

Describe your cloud security architecture and shared responsibility model implementation.

Do you have established information security policies approved by senior management?

Cryptography.question: Do you implement industry-standard encryption algorithms and key management practices?
